Package ui.controller

Class MenuInventoryAppController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.controller.MenuInventoryAppController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InventoryListener, MenuListener
    public class MenuInventoryAppController
extends java.lang.Object
implements MenuListener, InventoryListener
    The `MenuInventoryAppController` class manages the menu and inventory-related operations and events in the application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MenuInventoryAppController()
      Constructs a MenuInventoryAppController and initializes its services and shared state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void fetchMenuItems()
      Fetches the menu items from the MenuService and updates the shared state.
      MenuInventorySharedState getSharedState()
      Returns the shared state associated with the menu and inventory.
      void onInventoryDataChanged()
      Updates the inventory based on the new inventory data.
      void onMenuDataChanged()
      Updates the menu based on the new menu data.
      void onSignOutEvent()
      Handles the sign-out event by clearing the cart and updating the cart display.
      void setCashierReference​(SharedStateVarWrapper<Cashier> cashier)
      Sets the Cashier reference in the shared state from GlobalSharedState.
      void setDockedPageMembers​(ManagerMenuCustomization managerMenuCustomization, InventoryFrame inventoryFrame, MenuOrderScreen menuOrderScreen)
      Sets the docked page members for the controller.
      void setFullPageMembers​(CustomizationOrdering customizationOrdering)
      Sets the full page members for the controller.
      void subscribeToEventBroadcasters()
      Subscribes to the event broadcasters for menu and inventory changes.
